title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, April 15, 2020
description: It's the birthday of ‘the Empress of the Blues’ Bessie Smith (1898), who recorded150 blues numbers about poverty, unrequited love, and cruelty.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of ‘the Empress of the Blues’ Bessie Smith (1898), who recorded150 blues numbers about poverty, unrequited love, and cruelty.
